verses.text: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered:
As smoke is driven away, so drive them away:
But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God:
Sing unto God,
A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows,
God setteth the solitary in families: He bringeth out those which are bound with chains:
O God, when thou wentest forth before thy people,
The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God:
Thou, O God, didst send a plentiful rain, whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance,
Thy congregation hath dwelt therein:
The Lord gave the word:
Kings of armies did flee apace:
Though ye have lien among the pots, yet shall ye be as the wings of a dove
When the Almighty scattered kings in it,
The hill of God is as the hill of Bashan;
Why leap ye, ye high hills? This is the hill which God desireth to dwell in;
The chariots of God are twenty thousand, even thousands of angels:
Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: Thou hast received gifts for men;
Blessed be the Lord,
He that is our God is the God of salvation;
But God shall wound the head of his enemies,
The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring my people again
That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies,
They have seen thy goings, O God;
The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after;
Bless ye God in the congregations,
There is little Benjamin with their ruler, the princes of Judah and their council,
Thy God hath commanded thy strength:
Because of thy temple at Jerusalem
Rebuke the company of spearmen,
Princes shall come out of Egypt;
Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth;
To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens, which were of old;
Ascribe ye strength unto God: His excellency is over Israel,
O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places:
